metadata.dc:author: Ferrer Aguareles, José Luis
Ruiz Muñoz, Eulalio
metadata.dc:description: Vaccines are a key tool in disease prevention and public health. Its application through a vaccination schedule, which displayed what vaccinations and at what age should be given, it is irreplaceable for a high coverage. Nurses, working in a multidisciplinary manner are essential for successful implementation of vaccination programs.
metadata.dc:title: Vacunas. Calendario oficial de vacunaciones en la infancia y la adolescencia.
[Vaccines. Official calendar of vaccinations in the infancy and the adolescence].
